lst.name: sentence
lst.str: NEW DELHI - Hindus staged their biggest-ever rally in Delhi to press their claim against India's Moslem minority for control of a shrine disputed by the two faiths.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: BUENOS AIRES - Pope John Paul, starting a one-week tour of Argentina, told politicians they should always defend human rights and that even in difficult situations no government had a right to respond to violence with violence.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: FREETOWN, Sierra Leone - Sierra Leone's former vice-president Francis Minah, sacked two weeks after a failed coup, has been detained on suspicion of involvement in the plot, police sources said.
